Text:
Hi, it would help if you would name the tracks also you need to improve your tagging, so people can find your uploads, few people will look for a "homemade cd" tag, but if you would put "80s", or "remixes" that would give results...
Homemade cd you can put in the info for instances...

Thanks for the torrent, these are some excellent mixes. If you ever know the name of the remix, such as: gary numan-we are glass (12" remix) or gary numan-we are glass (super-duper mix), it would be cool to have that information too.
Thanks again!
thanks brainiac13,i will try and find that info for you.
